title: Justicar Syndra's balls are barely visible in Butchers Bridge
body:
Can't see her balls

I play in colourblind mode & Very Low graphics due to my potato laptop. Her ball is just on the bottom right of the turret

replies.body:
Good thing the Snow themed skins didn't have this issue on the normal ARAM map.......

At least the aren't as many Arclight/Justicar/Gold light themed skins.
That's probably just cos of your shitty graphics settings
it shouldn't matter, league should be optimised to every setting. not everyone can play at very high settings.

'Can't see her balls'
You'd expect a girl to have balls? :P

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=GE5LrTsE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-26T11:48:50.620+0000)
>
> the 99 ping doe

99 ping certainly isn't bad. I live in a small country town below perth WA, and im always at 120 ping. almost constantly
its usually at 30-33 but i was updating things in the background at the time
